attributes.action: Broadband & Telephone Freedom for all Hull & Surrounding Residents
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this to push the government to assess and help Hull & Surrounding areas break free from the imposing lock in that is KC Telecoms.

Currently KC deny that they are responsible for locking out all other telecom providers yet all other telecom providers state it is out of their power to provide this area with their services. Thus leaving us no choice but to sign up to KC & Karoo leaving them free to a captive audience with monopolizing consequences.

Help us to force the government to find someone to take responsibility and sort this mess out. We are the forgotten city, help give us a voice!
